        Draw a 3D rectangle

        highLightColor=0xADAAAD
        shadowColor=0xff0000
        isRaised=true
        lineWidth=15

        Parameters:
        canvas - Graphics context
        highLightColor -
        shadowColor -
        lineWidth - of rectangle side
        isRaised - raised or lowered 3d rectangle
        x - coordinate of 3D rect
        y - coordiate of 3D rect
        width - of the 3D rect
